actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, relating to the authority of the Attorney General over the confinement of offenders.

summary.text: States that if, on January 1, 1978, there is not available within the District of Columbia a suitable penal or correctional institution to which inmates confined in the Lorton Penal Institutions, Fairfax County, Virginia, might be transferred, the Attorney General may select a site in the District of Columbia and have erected thereon a penal institution. Directs the Attorney General to take such action after January 1, 1978, as may be necessary to dispose of the Lorton Penal Institutions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, relating to the authority of the Attorney General over the confinement of offenders.
